roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.label: exyra
roadmap.description: Autonomous execution, deployed in four stages.
roadmap.subDescription: From first connection to full orchestration, here's how Exyra activates your infrastructure.

stages.description: The Exyra protocol begins with its on-chain activation, token deployment and Uniswap launch. Early users gain access to foundational features including wallet prompts and yield discovery simulations. This phase establishes token utility, circulating supply and the baseline logic that powers the system.

The MVP dashboard goes live, enabling users to interact with the system through natural language prompts. Cerebrum, Exyra's reasoning core is deployed to translate user goals into modular execution paths. Insight Nodes activate, providing adaptive suggestions from wallet context, yield flows and real-time signals.
